name: Magmortar
description: Magmortar takes down its enemies by shooting fireballs, which burn them to a blackened crisp. It avoids this method when hunting prey.

attacks.name: Burst Punch
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Ground Burn
attacks.effect: Each player discards the top card of their deck. This attack does 100 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.
